typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	adf_run_id as string ('')
}
source(output(
		actual_arrival_airport as string,
		actual_departure_airport as string,
		actual_oooi_in as string,
		actual_oooi_off as string,
		actual_oooi_on as string,
		actual_oooi_out as string,
		aircraft_registration_number as string,
		aircraft_type as string,
		base_airport as string,
		cargo_weight as string,
		estimated_arrival as string,
		estimated_departure as string,
		flight_date as string,
		flight_id as short,
		flight_number as string,
		flight_type as string,
		fuel_in as double,
		fuel_out as double,
		fuel_uplift as short,
		is_canceled as boolean,
		is_verified as boolean,
		maint_log_page as integer,
		notes as string,
		scheduled_arrival as string,
		scheduled_arrival_airport as string,
		scheduled_departure as string,
		scheduled_departure_airport as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> BlobStorage
RenameColumns derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentDate(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $adf_run_id) ~> AddADFDetails
BlobStorage select(mapColumn(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT = actual_arrival_airport,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT = actual_departure_airport,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN = actual_oooi_in,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF = actual_oooi_off,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON = actual_oooi_on,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT = actual_oooi_out,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM = aircraft_registration_number,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE = aircraft_type,
		BASE_AIR_PORT = base_airport,
		CRGO_WGT = cargo_weight,
		ESTD_ARRVL = estimated_arrival,
		ESTD_DPTR = estimated_departure,
		FLT_DT = flight_date,
		FLT_ID = flight_id,
		FLT_NUM = flight_number,
		FLT_TYPE = flight_type,
		FUEL_IN = fuel_in,
		FUEL_OUT = fuel_out,
		FUEL_UPLIFT = fuel_uplift,
		IS_CNCLD = is_canceled,
		IS_VERFD = is_verified,
		MAINT_LOG_PG = maint_log_page,
		NOTES = notes,
		SCHDD_ARRVL = scheduled_arrival,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT = scheduled_arrival_airport,
		SCHDD_DPTR = scheduled_departure,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT = scheduled_departure_airport,
		UPDTD_AT = updated_at
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumns
AddADFDetails sink(input(
		AIR_CRAFT_CPTY as integer,
		ANCLRY_TMPLT_ID as string,
		ARRVL_GT as string,
		ARRVL_TRMNL as string,
		BTCH_CREW_MBR_MASK as string,
		BTCH_PSNGR_MASK as string,
		BRDNG_TIME as string,
		BKD_PSNGR_CNT as integer,
		CNCLD_BY as string,
		CNCLD_RSN as string,
		CARR_CD as double,
		CREW_FLT_POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		CREW_FLT_PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		DPTR_GT as string,
		DPTR_TRMNL as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_CITY as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_CNTRY_CD as string,
		DEST_AIRPORT_NAME as string,
		DEST_IATA as string,
		DEST_ICAO as string,
		ENABL_BRDNG as boolean,
		ENABL_CREW_APIS as boolean,
		ENABL_DCS as boolean,
		ENABL_PSNGR_APIS as boolean,
		ENABL_THRU_CHK_IN as boolean,
		ESTD_ARRVL_TIME as string,
		ESTD_DPTR_TIME as string,
		EXTRNL_ID as integer,
		FLT_DLAY as string,
		FLT_NO as integer,
		HAS_PSNGR_SCRTY_TRNS as boolean,
		HLTH_CHK_RULES_ID as string,
		PSNGRS as string,
		PAX_BTCH_PRE_VET_STS as string,
		FLT_ID as string,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_OPEN_STNG as boolean,
		IS_PRGRSV_FLT as boolean,
		MKTG_CARR_CD as string,
		MSG as string,
		ORIG_AIRPORT_CITY as string,
		ORIG_AIRPORT_CNTRY_CD as string,
		ORIG_AIRPORT_NAME as string,
		ORIG_IATA as string,
		ORIG_ICAO as string,
		PSNGR_APP_RCPNT_ID as string,
		PAX_FLT_POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		PAX_FLT_PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_STS as string,
		PNL_IMPRTD as boolean,
		POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_CREW_MBR_MASK as string,
		POST_DPTR_CLS_OUT_PSNGR_MASK as string,
		PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_CREW_MBR_MASK as string,
		PRE_DPTR_CLS_OUT_PSNGR_MASK as string,
		REMNG_FUEL_LOAD as boolean,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_TIME as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR_TIME as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR_TIME_UTC as timestamp,
		SEG_NO as integer,
		STS as string,
		TAIL_NO as string,
		TOT_CRGO_LOAD as boolean,
		TOT_FUEL_LOAD as boolean,
		TYPE as string,
		UPLIFT_FUEL_LOAD as boolean,
		USE_AVG_BAG_WGT as boolean,
		USE_AVG_PAX_WGT as boolean,
		WGT_UNITS_KG as boolean,
		CREW_APP_RCPNT_ID as string,
		ETL_CAPT_DT as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteToSQL
